column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/3e321180e2d559da67f23afae62beeee401d5ef2 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
So, how would you propose doing it? I didn't want to double-indent the entire block either.\n
@sipa I've refactored the function a bit do prevent the strange style anywhere and make it easier to read\n
I find such else if's rather hard to read, when they are behind a `}`.\n
Let's just agree that this is better than the original?\nThe point of this pull is to fix some serious locking issues, not to change the code into a work of art.\n
Sure and agreed, but I'm allowed to give such feedback anyway :)?\nI consider myself of no help in code parts with locking and such, sorry...\n
